name: 卡西迪斯劳特
name_full: 卡西迪斯劳特 Kassidy Slaughter
introduction: Kassidy Slaughter was born in the United States of America. She began her love for performing, very young. Whether it was dancing, acting, and performing little plays in front of her family, she's always had a love for entertainment. Her fascination in film was ignited when she discovered the bonus features category on the main menu of one of her favorite childhood movies. She began watching how movies were made, and it truly fascinated her. She decided she wanted to have a career in the film industry, whether it was acting, directing, or writing. She's truly happy doing anything in the industry- her favorite being acting. Kassidy has obtained lots of credits in feature films, TV series, and a short film. Kassidy is hard working and very passionate about what she does. In her free time, she creates YouTube videos, and is partnered with the major network Awesomeness TV.
